short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bulk Editor for App Store Metadata

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamline your App Store update process with our Chrome Extension! When you release a new version, you typically have to manually enter 'What's New' information for each of the 40 languages your app supports. This can be time-consuming and error-prone.

Our extension simplifies this task by allowing you to fill the 'What's New' section for all languages in bulk mode with just one click. This means you can update your app more efficiently, ensuring that your users around the world receive clear and consistent information about the latest features and improvements.

Say goodbye to manual data entry and hello to a more streamlined release process with our Chrome Extension!
